item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 5, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:

23. World-first therapy using donor cells sends autoimmune diseases into remission (58 points | 16 comments)

26. Wikidata as a Giant Crosswalk File (20 points | 2 comments)
27. Lost 1983 programming language resurrected by retro computing YouTube channel (16 points | 2 comments)

29. Show HN: I have published a mobile HN client to have coffee chat with HN users (21 points | 4 comments)
30. Mitmproxy 11: Full HTTP/3 Support (336 points | 61 comments)
